page.title: Shoulder Blade Squeeze
page.content: Make an Appointment Ask a Question Search Conditions How this helps: It opens your chest muscles and helps improve posture. How to do it: Stand straight and tall. Pull your shoulder blades back and slightly downward to bring your elbows back and inward. Return to the starting position. Repeat 10 times.
